name: Rayman Redesigner
description:
Rayman level creator by Ryemanni

"Rayman ReDesigner is a stand alone level designer for Rayman Redemption. ReDesigner features most of the stuff from Redemption as well as a bunch of new stuff.

Check out the main game:
https://gamejolt.com/games/raymanredemption/340532

Dedicated website for sharing your levels, custom skins and backgrounds:
https://raydistributor.com/

The game was build and tested on Windows 10, so other compatability is not currenty guaranteed."
